contexts.context: .... Miniatures accompanying Cicero's Aratea, depicting Aries (f.32v); <mark>Deltoton</mark> (f.33r); Pisces (f.33v); Perseus (f.34r); Pleiades (f.34v); Lyra (f.35r);...
...anticanis, aquila (?) […], Orion, Telum, <mark>deltoton</mark>, andromeda, lepus, coetus, canis....
...cepheus, cassiepia andromeda, equus, aries, <mark>deltoton</mark> pisces, perseus, pleiades, lyra cycnus,...
...lira auis cepheus et cassiapea/ auriga et perseus <mark>deltoton</mark> et andromedę astrum/ pegasus et delphini telumque aquila...
...as in the case for Cassiepia and Andromeda, <mark>Deltoton</mark>.
